page.title: 04School
page.content:
Alburgh with denton First School
Alburgh with Denton First School is housed in a building 138 years old. Children begin school at the age if five and stay until they are eight when they go by bus to the junior school in Harleston. The catchment area includes all of Alburgh and the neighbouring villang of Denton although some children are bought from further afield by parents. There are 2 classes and about 40 pupils. All the children lunch at school - either a packed meal from home or a cooked one brought from Harleston. Teaching...Mrs B.Burke , Mrs L.Wood Ancillary..Mrs V.Fairhead and Mrs M.Sturgeon Cleaner/Dinner Supervisor Mrs N.Ambrose
